# Add New Page Prompt

Create a new HTML page for the EV Car Rental website.

## Requirements
- Follow the existing page structure (header, nav, main, footer)
- Include proper meta tags and document structure
- Link to css/styles.css and js/main.js
- Use semantic HTML5 elements
- Be mobile-first responsive

## Template Structure
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <meta name="description" content="[PAGE DESCRIPTION]">
  <title>[PAGE TITLE] - EV Car Rental</title>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/styles.css">
</head>
<body>
  <!-- Header (copy from existing pages) -->
  
  <!-- Page Header -->
  <section class="page-header">
    <div class="container">
      <h1>[PAGE TITLE]</h1>
      <p>[PAGE SUBTITLE]</p>
    </div>
  </section>
  
  <!-- Breadcrumb -->
  <nav class="breadcrumb">
    <div class="container">
      <ul>
        <li><a href="index.html">Home</a></li>
        <li>[PAGE NAME]</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </nav>
  
  <!-- Main Content -->
  <section class="section">
    <div class="container">
      <!-- Page-specific content -->
    </div>
  </section>
  
  <!-- Footer (copy from existing pages) -->
  
  <script src="js/main.js"></script>
</body>
</html>
```
